languages.text: "Это называется "исполнение своего долга", госпожа Хейдари. Вам, может, это понятие и неведомо, только вот для большинства имперцев это достойная обыденность".
"It is called doing your duty, Mistress Heydari. You may not be familiar with the concept, but for most of the Imperium's subjects, it is the honourable mundanity."
languages.original_text: "Это называется "исполнение своего долга", госпожа Хейдари. Вам, может, это понятие и неведомо, только вот для большинства имперцев это достойная обыденность".

traits.locale_text: "It is called doing your duty, Mistress Heydari. You may not be familiar with the concept, but for most of the Imperium's subjects, it is the honourable mundanity."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « C'est ce qu'on appelle "faire son devoir", maîtresse Heydari. Cette notion vous est peut-être étrangère, mais pour la grande majorité des sujets de l'Imperium, il s'agit d'un pilier essentiel de l'existence. »
languages.original_text: "It is called doing your duty, Mistress Heydari. You may not be familiar with the concept, but for most of the Imperium's subjects, it is the honourable mundanity."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ce qu'on appelle "faire son devoir", maîtresse Heydari. Cette notion vous est peut-être étrangère, mais pour la grande majorité des sujets de l'Imperium, il s'agit d'un pilier essentiel de l'existence. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ヘイダリ女史、それが『義務を果たす』ということです。あなたには馴染みのない概念かもしれませんが、帝国の多くの臣民にとって、それは名誉あることなのです」
languages.original_text: "It is called doing your duty, Mistress Heydari. You may not be familiar with the concept, but for most of the Imperium's subjects, it is the honourable mundanity."

traits.locale_text: 「ヘイダリ女史、それが『義務を果たす』ということです。あなたには馴染みのない概念かもしれませんが、帝国の多くの臣民にとって、それは名誉あることなのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “这叫做‘履行职责’，海达利女士。或许你并不熟悉这个概念，但对帝国的绝大多数臣民而言，这是光荣的传统。”
languages.original_text: "It is called doing your duty, Mistress Heydari. You may not be familiar with the concept, but for most of the Imperium's subjects, it is the honourable mundanity."

traits.locale_text: “这叫做‘履行职责’，海达利女士。或许你并不熟悉这个概念，但对帝国的绝大多数臣民而言，这是光荣的传统。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Das nennt man seine Pflicht tun, Herrin Heydari. Euch mag das Konzept nicht vertraut sein, doch für die meisten Untertanen des Imperiums ist es der ehrenvolle Alltag."
languages.original_text: "It is called doing your duty, Mistress Heydari. You may not be familiar with the concept, but for most of the Imperium's subjects, it is the honourable mundanity."

traits.locale_text: "Das nennt man seine Pflicht tun, Herrin Heydari. Euch mag das Konzept nicht vertraut sein, doch für die meisten Untertanen des Imperiums ist es der ehrenvolle Alltag."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Es cuestión de deber, señora Heydari. Tal vez no le resulte familiar el concepto, pero es el honorable día a día de la mayoría de súbditos del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "It is called doing your duty, Mistress Heydari. You may not be familiar with the concept, but for most of the Imperium's subjects, it is the honourable mundanity."

traits.locale_text: «Es cuestión de deber, señora Heydari. Tal vez no le resulte familiar el concepto, pero es el honorable día a día de la mayoría de súbditos del Imperium».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Buna vazifeni yerine getirmek denir Üstat Heydari. Konsepte aşina olmayabilirsin ancak İmparatorluk'un çoğu tebaası için onurlu bir yaşamdır."
languages.original_text: "It is called doing your duty, Mistress Heydari. You may not be familiar with the concept, but for most of the Imperium's subjects, it is the honourable mundanity."
